defs.title: SVG Definitions
defs.desc: Contains patterns and symbols used in the map.

svg.title: Land Map - Vehari Area
svg.desc: A map showing land plots, ownership, common areas, and features. Dimension labels (e.g., '220x198ft') have been removed from all plots. The right filler box contains a table with details from Khewat Number 202. The filler boxes align vertically with the N-plots. Plots N1-N5 and the compass are positioned above the Main Road. Common Passage 1 and Common Passage 2 are styled with a colorless brick outline pattern. Other features include a water body, drainage channels, and a Haveli. Plots 4, 14, 24, and 34 have been widened by extending their left boundaries to meet the central water course.

g.title: Filler Area Right with Khewat 202 Details

text.tspan: شمیم ما ئی دختر صالح محمد
ضما دعلی ولد حافظ عبدالحکیمارا ئیں
عائشہ بی بی دختر شان محمد زوجہ محمد حنیف
حافظ عتیق احمد نوید ولد رفیع محمد
جمیلہ بیگم بيوہ محمد رفیع شکوری
فرزانہ لئیق زوجہ لئیق احمدارا ئیں
محمد اشفاق ولد محمد مشتاقارائیں فتح پوریہ

g.title: Plot 4 - Owner: Ilm Din (Adjusted Width, Reduced Height)

svg.text: Note: Standard plot dimensions (220ft x 198ft) shown. Some widths/heights adjusted for passages. Subdivided plots have approximate dimensions.
